mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.repairtype AS "repairtype", a.applyname AS "applyname", a.phone AS "phone", a.content AS "content", a.contentdetail AS "contentdetail", a.imgurl AS "imgurl", a.appointmenttime AS "appointmenttime", a.proc_ins_id, a.memberid AS "memberid", a.repairstatus AS "repairstatus", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.updatetime AS "updatetime", a.roomId AS "roomId", a.group_id AS "groupId"
mapper.select:
SELECT
,b.member_name AS "memberName" FROM wy_repair a, wy_member b
WHERE a.id = #{id} and a.memberid = b.member_id

SELECT
,b.member_name AS "memberName" FROM wy_repair a, wy_member b
WHERE a.memberid = b.member_id
AND a.repairtype = #{repairtype}
AND a.applyname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{applyname},'%')
AND a.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{content},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wy_repair( id, repairtype, applyname, phone, content, contentdetail, imgurl, appointmenttime, memberid, repairstatus, createtime, updatetime, roomId, group_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{repairtype}, #{applyname}, #{phone}, #{content}, #{contentdetail}, #{imgurl}, #{appointmenttime}, #{memberid}, #{repairstatus}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime}, #{roomId}, #{groupId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wy_repair SET repairtype = #{repairtype}, applyname = #{applyname}, phone = #{phone}, content = #{content}, contentdetail = #{contentdetail}, imgurl = #{imgurl}, appointmenttime = #{appointmenttime}, memberid = #{memberid}, repairstatus = #{repairstatus}, createtime = #{createtime}, updatetime = #{updatetime}, roomId = #{roomId}, group_id =#{groupId} WHERE id = #{id}
